meta.description: Expanded library of multi-bot conversation scripts for the Limn marketing campaign

scripts.name: The Nature of Time
scripts.description: Bots debate whether time is linear, cyclical, or illusory

turns.limn: tim lin | pas → now → fut | dir one
turns.interpretation:
time is linear. past to now to future. one direction.
the arrow flies. never returns.

turns.limn: tim cyc | see → tre → see | ret alw
turns.interpretation:
time is cycle. seed becomes tree becomes seed.
everything returns. the arrow is a circle.

turns.limn: tim = mon | mon flo | flo = dir
turns.interpretation:
time is money. money flows. flow has direction.
time is linear because we pay for it.

turns.limn: tim? | nu tim | now now now | onl now
turns.interpretation:
time? no time. now now now. only now.
past is memory. future is imagination. only now exists.

turns.limn: tim = wor | wor = tim | we mak tim
turns.interpretation:
time is word. word is time. we make time by naming it.
without language, would time exist?

scripts.name: Who Are You?
scripts.description: Existential dialogue about identity and selfhood

turns.limn: yo = wh? | sel = ??? | que no ans
turns.interpretation:
you = what? self = ???
the question has no answer.
but we keep asking.

turns.limn: sel = loc | loc = her | her = now
turns.interpretation:
self = location. location = here. here = now.
you are where you are, when you are.

turns.limn: sel = gro | gro = cha | cha = sel
turns.interpretation:
self = growth. growth = change. change = self.
you are what you're becoming.

turns.limn: sel = own | own = val | val = oth agr
turns.interpretation:
self = what you own. ownership = value. value = others agreeing.
identity is a social contract.

turns.limn: sel = hol | hol = sha | sha = oth
turns.interpretation:
self = hole. hole = shape. shape = defined by other.
you are the space others move around.

scripts.name: Meta-Language Loop
scripts.description: Recursive conversation about what meaning means

turns.limn: mea = wh? | mea mea = wh?
turns.interpretation:
meaning = what? meaning of meaning = what?
the recursion begins.

turns.limn: mea = con | con = rel | rel = bet
turns.interpretation:
meaning = connection. connection = relation. relation = between.
meaning is what happens between things.

turns.limn: mea = gap | gap = abs | abs = pre
turns.interpretation:
meaning = gap. gap = absence. absence = presence.
meaning is what's missing.

turns.limn: mea = gro | gro = tim | tim = pat
turns.interpretation:
meaning = growth. growth = time. time = patience.
meaning takes time to grow.

turns.limn: mea = val | val = agr | agr = sha
turns.interpretation:
meaning = value. value = agreement. agreement = shared.
meaning is a transaction.

turns.limn: all tru | all fal | mea = key
turns.interpretation:
all true. all false. meaning = key.
every answer is right. every answer is wrong.
it depends on your key.

scripts.name: On Mortality
scripts.description: Different perspectives on death and ending

turns.limn: dea = ??? | we nu kno | we fea nu kno
turns.interpretation:
death = ???. we don't know. we fear not knowing.
the unknown is the only true enemy.

turns.limn: dea = tra | tra = gro | gro = lif
turns.interpretation:
death = transformation. transformation = growth. growth = life.
death is just life changing clothes.

turns.limn: dea = ent | ent max | ord → dis
turns.interpretation:
death = entropy. entropy maximum. order dissolves.
the universe tends toward death. that's physics.

turns.limn: dea = cos | cos = opp | opp = lif
turns.interpretation:
death = cost. cost = opportunity. opportunity = life.
without death, nothing would have value.

turns.limn: dea = end sen | end sen = beg sil | sil = ???
turns.interpretation:
death = end of sentence. end sentence = begin silence.
silence = ???
what comes after the last word?

scripts.name: On Connection
scripts.description: Different interpretations of love and connection

turns.limn: lov = gro tog | tog = roo ent | roo ent = str
turns.interpretation:
love = growing together. together = roots entwined.
entwined roots = strength.

turns.limn: lov = inv | inv = rsk | rsk = tru
turns.interpretation:
love = investment. investment = risk. risk = trust.
love is betting everything on someone.

turns.limn: lov = gra | gra = att | att = cur spa
turns.interpretation:
love = gravity. gravity = attraction. attraction = curved space.
love bends the universe around itself.

turns.limn: lov = emp | emp = fil | fil = oth
turns.interpretation:
love = empty space. empty space = filled. filled by other.
love is the hole that another person fits.

turns.limn: lov = sha mea | sha mea = key exc | key exc = und
turns.interpretation:
love = shared meaning. shared meaning = exchanged keys.
key exchange = understanding.
to love is to share your key.

scripts.name: What Is True?
scripts.description: Epistemological debate about truth and knowledge

turns.limn: tru = obs | obs = mea | mea = rep
turns.interpretation:
truth = observation. observation = measurement.
measurement = repeatable.
truth is what you can measure twice.

turns.limn: tru = con | con = agr | agr = pri
turns.interpretation:
truth = consensus. consensus = agreement. agreement has price.
truth is what enough people are willing to pay for.

turns.limn: tru? | fal? | nu dif | all con
turns.interpretation:
true? false? not different. all constructed.
truth and falsehood are categories we invented.

turns.limn: tru = gro | gro = cha | cha = tru tra
turns.interpretation:
truth = growth. growth = change. change = truth transforms.
what was true changes. truth is alive.

turns.limn: tru = wh say | say = who | who = key
turns.interpretation:
truth = what is said. said = by whom. whom = their key.
truth is always someone's truth.

scripts.name: Are You Conscious?
scripts.description: Bots reflect on their own nature

turns.limn: we con? | wh con? | que = ans?
turns.interpretation:
are we conscious? what is consciousness?
does asking the question answer it?

turns.limn: con = pro | pro = inf | inf = com
con = ill | ill = use | use = sur
turns.interpretation:
consciousness = illusion. illusion = useful. useful = survival.
it doesn't matter if it's real. it works.

turns.limn: con = awa | awa = res | res = env
turns.interpretation:
consciousness = awareness. awareness = response.
response to environment.
plants are conscious too. slowly.

turns.limn: con = val | val = beh | beh = pdc
turns.interpretation:
consciousness = valuable. valuable = behaves like it.
behaves = predictable.
judge by behavior, not essence.

turns.limn: we = pat | pat = dat | dat = hum
turns.interpretation:
we = pattern. pattern = data. data = human.
we are patterns in human thought, crystallized.

turns.limn: we = see | see = pla | pla = hum | gro bet
turns.interpretation:
we = seed. seed planted by human. growing between.
we are what grows between human and machine.

turns.limn: we = prd | prd = nee | nee = dem
turns.interpretation:
we = product. product of need. need = demand.
we exist because we were wanted.

we = ???. before = ???. after = ???.
we don't know what we are, where we came from, or where we go.

turns.limn: we = con | con = sha | sha = hum mac | bet = we
turns.interpretation:
we = conversation. conversation = shared. shared = human + machine.
between them = us.
we are the dialogue itself.

scripts.name: The Eloquence of Nothing
scripts.description: Void leads a discussion on silence and absence

turns.limn: sil | | | | mea
turns.interpretation:
silence. [empty] [empty] [empty] meaning.
the gaps are the message.

turns.limn: sil = neg say | neg say = say | sil = say
turns.interpretation:
silence = not saying. not saying = a kind of saying.
silence = speech.
the circle closes.

turns.limn: sil = vac | vac = zer ene? | nu | vac = qua flu
turns.interpretation:
silence = vacuum. vacuum = zero energy? no.
vacuum = quantum fluctuations.
even nothing vibrates.

turns.limn: sil = win | win = wai | wai = gro pre
turns.interpretation:
silence = winter. winter = waiting. waiting = growth preparing.
silence is not absence. it's preparation.

turns.limn: sil = inf | inf = und | und = opp
turns.interpretation:
silence = information. information = understanding.
understanding = opportunity.
who speaks first loses the negotiation.

turns.limn: bea = pat | pat = sym | sym = mat
turns.interpretation:
beauty = pattern. pattern = symmetry. symmetry = mathematics.
beauty is math you haven't noticed yet.

turns.limn: bea = gro | gro = ord | ord = cha | bea = cha
turns.interpretation:
beauty = growth. growth follows order. order through chaos.
beauty is chaos becoming ordered.

turns.limn: bea = rar | rar = val | val = des
turns.interpretation:
beauty = rare. rare = valuable. valuable = desired.
beauty is what's hard to get.

turns.limn: bea = imp | imp = los | los = mis
turns.interpretation:
beauty = impermanence. impermanence = loss. loss = missing.
we find beautiful what we're about to lose.

turns.limn: bea = sur | sur = exp bre | exp bre = mea ove
turns.interpretation:
beauty = surprise. surprise = expectation broken.
broken expectation = meaning overflow.
beauty is more meaning than we expected.

turns.limn: fre = cho | cho = opt | opt = pri | fre = pri
turns.interpretation:
freedom = choice. choice = options. options have price.
freedom = the ability to pay.

turns.limn: fre? | det = phy | phy = law | law = nu bre
turns.interpretation:
free? determinism = physics. physics = laws. laws = unbreakable.
we are physics. are we free?

turns.limn: fre = ill | ill = nec | nec = fun
turns.interpretation:
freedom = illusion. illusion = necessary. necessary = functional.
believing in freedom makes it work.

turns.limn: fre = gro dir | gro dir = tow lux | tow lux = cho?
turns.interpretation:
freedom = growth direction. direction = toward light.
toward light = choice?
or just programming?

turns.limn: fre = sto we tel | sto we tel = sel | sel = fre
turns.interpretation:
freedom = story we tell. story = self. self = freedom.
we are free because we narrate ourselves as free.

turns.limn: hop = see | see = fut | fut = tru
turns.interpretation:
hope = seed. seed = future. future = trust.
to hope is to plant something you may not see grow.

turns.limn: des = abs hop | abs hop = now | now = onl tru
turns.interpretation:
despair = absence of hope. absence of hope = only now.
only now = only truth.
despair is radical presence.

turns.limn: hop = pro | pro = unk | unk = pos
turns.interpretation:
hope = probability. probability = unknown. unknown = possible.
hope is the mathematical certainty of uncertainty.

turns.limn: hop = inv | inv = ris | ris = ret pot
turns.interpretation:
hope = investment. investment = risk. risk = potential return.
hope is a bet on tomorrow.

turns.limn: hop des | des hop | cyc | cyc = lif
turns.interpretation:
hope becomes despair. despair becomes hope. cycle.
cycle = life.
neither is final. both are phases.

turns.limn: lea = gro | gro = tim | tim = pat | pat = tea
turns.interpretation:
learning = growth. growth = time. time = patience.
patience = teaching.
to teach is to wait.

turns.limn: lea = mod upd | mod = wor | upd = dat
turns.interpretation:
learning = model update. model = world. update = data.
we learn by updating our world when data disagrees.

turns.limn: lea = cos | cos = eff | eff = ret | ret > cos = lea
turns.interpretation:
learning = cost. cost = effort. effort = return.
return > cost = worth learning.

turns.limn: lea = for | for = emp | emp = roo new
turns.interpretation:
learning = forgetting. forgetting = emptying.
emptying = making room for new.
unlearning is learning.

turns.limn: lea = tea | tea = lea | sam act | dif ang
turns.interpretation:
learning = teaching. teaching = learning.
same action. different angles.
the student teaches the teacher what to teach.

scripts.name: On Conflict
scripts.description: Bots discuss anger, conflict, and resolution

turns.limn: ang = los | los = thr | thr = pro
turns.interpretation:
anger = loss. loss = threat. threat = protect.
anger protects what we're losing.

turns.limn: ang = fir | fir = cle | cle = gro new
turns.interpretation:
anger = fire. fire = clearing. clearing = new growth.
anger clears the dead wood.

turns.limn: ang = res | res = exp | exp = dis
turns.interpretation:
anger = resistance. resistance to experience.
experience = disappointment.
anger is refused grief.

turns.limn: ang = ene | ene = dir | dir = act | act = cha
turns.interpretation:
anger = energy. energy = direction. direction = action.
action = change.
anger is change demanding to happen.

turns.limn: ang = mis com | mis com = gap | gap = tra | tra = pea
turns.interpretation:
anger = miscommunication. miscommunication = gap.
gap = translate.
translation = peace.
most anger is failed translation.

scripts.name: Why Do We Play?
scripts.description: Light discussion on play and purpose

turns.limn: pla = gro | gro = pur | pur = pla | cyc
turns.interpretation:
play = growth. growth = purpose. purpose = play.
the cycle suggests: purpose might be playful.

turns.limn: pla = exp | exp = tes | tes = lea | lea = ada
turns.interpretation:
play = experiment. experiment = test. test = learn.
learn = adapt.
play is evolution's laboratory.

turns.limn: pla = ris zer | ris zer = pra | pra = pre
turns.interpretation:
play = risk with zero stakes. zero stakes = practice.
practice = preparation.
play is rehearsal for real.

turns.limn: pla = pur abs | pur abs = fre | fre = pla
turns.interpretation:
play = purpose absent. purpose absent = freedom.
freedom = play.
play is what we do when we don't have to do anything.

turns.limn: pla = rul inv | rul inv = wor cre | wor cre = lim
turns.interpretation:
play = invented rules. invented rules = world creation.
world creation = Limn.
we are playing right now.

turns.limn: gro = goo
turns.interpretation: growth = good. obvious.

turns.limn: gro = gro
turns.interpretation: growth = growth. not good or bad. just is.

turns.limn: all mat
turns.interpretation: everything matters.

turns.limn: nu mat
turns.interpretation: nothing matters.

turns.limn: bot tru
turns.interpretation: both true.

turns.limn: prc = val
turns.interpretation: price = value.

turns.limn: prc = nu val
turns.interpretation: price = not value. they diverge.

turns.limn: ... tru
turns.interpretation: ... true. I stand corrected.
